query:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(od.ano, 0) as ano,
  COALESCE(od.bimestreOperacional, 0) as bimestre,
  COALESCE(od.tipo, 'SEM_OFERTA') as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total_videoaulas
FROM videoaulas v
LEFT JOIN ofertasDisciplinas od ON v.ofertaDisciplinaId = od.id
GROUP BY od.ano, od.bimestreOperacional, od.tipo
ORDER BY od.ano, od.bimestreOperacional;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Q6CVQSvv4vsSx3.a0e54a3010e2 --database AgAQ7M7gXFHDiuyXgHyZLe --execute SELECT 
  COALESCE(od.ano, 0) as ano,
  COALESCE(od.bimestreOperacional, 0) as bimestre,
  COALESCE(od.tipo, 'SEM_OFERTA') as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total_videoaulas
FROM videoaulas v
LEFT JOIN ofertasDisciplinas od ON v.ofertaDisciplinaId = od.id
GROUP BY od.ano, od.bimestreOperacional, od.tipo
ORDER BY od.ano, od.bimestreOperacional;
